thread.title: BRIEF-Agellan Commercial REIT Buys Seven Light Industrial Properties

title: BRIEF-Agellan Commercial REIT Buys Seven Light Industrial Properties
text:
April 6, 2018 / 2:00 PM / in 23 minutes BRIEF-Agellan Commercial REIT Buys Seven Light Industrial Properties Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 6 (Reuters) - Agellan Commercial Real Investment Trust : 
* AGELLAN COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST ANNOUNCES THE ACQUISITION OF SEVEN LIGHT INDUSTRIAL PROPERTIES IN DALLAS, TEXAS * DEAL FOR ‍APPROXIMATELY US$12.2 MILLION​ 
* ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO BE IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO REIT’S AFFO PER UNIT 
* EXPECTS TO FINANCE DEAL BY DRAWING DOWN OPERATING CREDIT FACILITY, OBTAINING FIRST MORTGAGE SECURED BY ACQUIRED PROPERTIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
